questions.question: When do you say 'Nice to meet you'?
questions.context: Your colleague introduces you to a new team member.
options: A. When you see an old friend
B. When you meet someone for the first time
D. When you ask for help
questions.explanation: 'Nice to meet you' is ONLY used when meeting someone for the FIRST time. For old friends, use 'Good to see you'. For goodbye, use 'See you later'.

questions.context: You're at a party. Your friend introduces you to someone. You say: '___!'
